title: New Moon
description: Final Bonus length Installment of the National Bestselling Serial Part 6: New Moon (M/F/M) Brant and Zane have a ton of work ahead of them. It will see them groveling, begging, pleading…on their freaking knees. No, that would be letting them off too easily…crawling over hot coals…naked. New Moon is the final episode and is approximately 31,000 words/124 pages The story contains strong sexual themes/language and is not intended for readers under the age of 18. (M/F/M)
author: Charlene Hartnady
